thread.section_title: Saatchi Art Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Saatchi Art | saatchiart.com
thread.title: Benjamin

author: Benjamin
title: Benjamin
text: I am accustomed to difficulties in importing artworks to the Philippines due to a rather clumsy and arbitrary customs system. So I was rather dreading another round with them when I ordered a wonderful photograph via saatchi. Instead, I arrived home after a week to find it waiting for me. The global service of saatchi had taken care of everything. I will happily continue to business with saatchi, not least because of the excellent selection of art which they make available to all of us.
